resources.string: What\'s the name of your first pet?
What was the model of your first car?
What\'s the name of the town where you were born?
Which phone number do you remember most from your childhood?
What street did you grow up on?
What is the name of your first school?
What is your father\'s middle name?
Click the star to Mark/Unmark this account as Favorite
Pick a logo for your account:

4.- The \"+/-\" button allows to toggle between positive and negative numbers and vice versa. This button can only be used when the Temperature property has been selected, as transforming negative magnitudes of weight and volume does not make any sense.Negative sign can be set, even when the input box is empty and has no numerical value yet. Negative values are only possible for Celsius and Fahrenheit scales, since Kelvin is an absolute scale, which minimum point is zero. Minimum valid values for Celsius and Fahrenheit are -273.15°C and -456.67°F, respectively. 4.- The \"+/-\" button allows to toggle between positive and negative numbers and vice versa.
